channel.title: How do i play on 508 server?
channel.description:
I think this topic belongs here not sure if it does or doesn’t if it doesn’t belong here tell me where it belongs.
I want to know how to play on a 508 servers I know its graphic is like rs, but what’s this ipchanger? if I download the server client will I still need ipchanger can anyone? answer me please.

item.title: How do i play on 508 server?

item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

a 508 client is an ipchanger lol

item.title: How do i play on 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“magicrcher 2, post:1, topic:309587”]I think this topic belongs here not sure if it does or doesn’t if it doesn’t belong here tell me where it belongs.

I want to know how to play on a 508 servers I know its graphic is like rs, but what’s this ipchanger? if I download the server client will I still need ipchanger can anyone? answer me please.[/quote]

You need a “508 IP-Changable client” to play on any 508 you find, or the servers 508 IP changer.

The IP changer i believe just means you can switch the IP easily without editing the client.

Just search here for “508 ip changer” or something and DL it, they normaly take 5-15 minutes to download, so be pacient.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i play on 508 server?
